text: Yanomamia guianensis is a South American lizard of the family Gymnophthalmidae. It has been found only at higher elevations on Mount Ayanganna and Mount Roraima in west-central Guyana. ==References== guianensis Category:Reptiles of Guyana Category:Endemic fauna of Guyana Category:Reptiles described in 2001 Category:Taxa named by Ross Douglas MacCulloch Category:Taxa named by Amy Lathrop
title: Yanomamia guianensis
